resources.string:
"Information : 
 This app is used to detect potholes and creates a database for later uses.

 >>>How to use :-
 1. Adjust the value of therhold in the EditText (Default 15 m/s.s), suitable values for varios Vehicles are as follows :-
 "BIKE ---> ~11.5"
 "CAR(small) ---> 11.5 ~ 11.0"
 "CAR(big) ---> 11.1 ~ 10.5"
 "BUS ---> ~10.5"

** Threshold basically depends upon the diameter of the wheel of the Vehicle.

 2. Place the device in such a manner so that it's Screen is parallel to the road.


3. The Device will detect potholes with their location. 
"
